xml.data:
Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 3 Kusalattika, Cūḷantaraduka » 3.5 Kusalattika, Rūpīduka » 3.5.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
Kusalattika, Cūḷantaraduka
Kusalattika, Rūpīduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
28.
1167Kusalo arūpī dhammo kusalassa arūpissa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
1168Akusalo arūpī dhammo akusalassa arūpissa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
1169Abyākato arūpī dhammo abyākatassa arūpissa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
1170Kusalo arūpī dhammo kusalassa arūpissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1171Akusalo arūpī dhammo akusalassa arūpissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1172Abyākato arūpī dhammo abyākatassa arūpissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
29.
1173Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta…pe…  sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre…pe…  sampayutte tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1174(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
